message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,000. It's in excellent condition and worth a lot to you. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $12,000 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down a bit further, but $13,500 is my final offer. Let me know if you're interested.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above $12,000. Would you be willing to meet me at $12,750?
